thread.title: Martellus Bennett dances with Patriots cheerleaders
thread.title_full: Martellus Bennett dances with Patriots cheerleaders

author: JOHN HEALY
title: Martellus Bennett dances with Patriots cheerleaders
text:
Martellus Bennett dances with Patriots cheerleaders after winning AFC Championship Martellus Bennett dances with Patriots cheerleaders Sunday, January 22, 2017, 10:50 PM 
Martellus Bennett just wants to dance with somebody. 
It’s not always all business with the Patriots as their tight end went into a full-fledged celebration with the team’s cheerleaders following Sunday’s 36-17 rout of the Steelers in the AFC Championship. 
Bennett, who will be going to his first Super Bowl of his career, grabbed himself some pom-poms and began dancing with the cheerleaders as Whitney Houston’s “I Wanna Dance with Somebody” played in the background. Martellus Bennett is celebrating his first Super Bowl trip in style. (Charles Krupa/AP) 
Bennett has filled the void at tight end since Rob Gronkowski’s season ended with back surgery, hauling in five catches for 52 yards in Sunday’s win. 
He should enjoy it now, as Belichick likely won’t tolerate any more dancing until after the Super Bowl. Join the Conversation:
